sections.heading: securities; interest; company's right to collect
sections.text: The trust company may collect and retain the interest of all securities pledged as provided in section 8-209.SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XVIII, § 13, p. 722;C.S.1922, § 8075;C.S.1929, § 8-213;Laws 1933, c. 18, § 79, p. 176;C.S.Supp.,1941, §

8-216.Pledged securities; interest; company's right to collect.

The trust company may collect and retain the interest of all securities pledged as provided in section 8-209.

SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XVIII, § 13, p. 722;C.S.1922, § 8075;C.S.1929, § 8-213;Laws 1933, c. 18, § 79, p. 176;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 8-213;R.S.1943, § 8-216;Laws 1993, LB 81, § 30.
